<title level="1" right="Action">[Take a Breather](/Actions.aspx?ID=463) <actions string="" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Exploration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=66" />
<trait label="Stamina" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=295" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 200</row>

**Cost** 1 Resolve Point

</column>

---

You rest for 10 minutes and recover your stamina. After you complete this activity, you regain all your Stamina Points.
name: Take a Breather
